alert.note: Alert for Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 1:13PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Churchill and southwestern Pershing Counties through 145 PM PDT... At 110 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near I-80 at Trinity Junction, or 18 miles southwest of Lovelock. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain near I-80 and over rural areas of northwestern Churchill and southwestern Pershing Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
